overview: Sahin works as a farmer for Hidir Aga. Sahin is in love with Zeynep who is fancied by Hidir's son Suleyman, too. Enmity comes to exist between Sahin and Hidir Aga. Hidir denounces him to the gendarme chief Hasan. Yet Hasan believes Sahin and sets him free. Hidir urges Zeynep to get engaged with his son. Sahin kidnaps Zeynep. Suleyman and his men follow them, Zeynep kills Suleyman. Hidir and his men are after them now. They find their trace. Zeynep gets injured in the fight and dies. Now, the time has come for Sahin to take revenge and death is inevitable.
title: Dağlar Şahini
